subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description:
In targeted municipalities of Banovina – Kordun area:
•	Key community support structures improved or established to address the needs of most vulnerable social groups
•	Limited (re)construction of infrastructure carried out;
•	Business development services, assistance to accessing investment capital and to public-private partnership establishment provided.
subproject.title: SOCIO-ECON. RECOVERY BANOVINA

subproject.description:
Output 1: 	Creation of the sub-regional hub for assistance to local government in the Western Balkans
Output 2: 	Assessment of the local governments’ absorption / pre-accession capacities
Output 3: 	Introduction and implementation of municipal performance management
donor_long: Network of Associations of local Authori
